verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Nitakwenda kwa shangwe
na vigelegele,
Niingie nyumbani mwa Bwana
Mungu wangu.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Nitacheza, nitaruka,
nitaimba, wimbo ule mtamu.
Baba njooni mama njooni,
tufurahi mbele za Mungu wetu. x2

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Njoni wote wazee
vijana na watoto,
shangilieni leo nyumbani
mwake Bwana.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Nitasema asante kwako
Mola Rabana,
Kwa ukarimu wako usio na kifani.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Nitatoa shukrani zangu
kwa Mungu muumba,
nitakushukuru leo,
kesho na daima.
